docs.title: Context
docs.text: What is the issue that we're seeing that is motivating this decision or change?

docs.title: Assumptions
docs.text: Anything that could cause problems if untrue now or later

docs.title: Decision
docs.text: What is the change that we're proposing and/or doing?

docs.title: Risks
docs.text: Anything that could cause malfunction, delay, or other negative impacts

docs.title: Consequences
docs.text: What becomes easier or more difficult to do because of this change?

docs.title: More Information
docs.text: Provide additional evidence/confidence for the decision outcome Links to other decisions and resources might here appear as well.
